description:
Lum drags Ataru along to fight in her planet`s Setsubun Festival, but the lecher becomes enamored with one of his opponents: the warrior biker Benten. After the battle, Ataru tries to use Earth`s Setsubun to drive Lum away, but Benten suddenly rides into town with her posse.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combat d`ogres / Le match retour de l`équipe de Benten
La grande battaglia - Match di ritorno
Setsubun Daisensou / Benten Gundan no Return Match
The Great Spring War / The Benten Gang`s Return Match
せつぶん 大戦争 - 弁天軍団 リターンマッチ
